text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Tall. Sound Damage. Slows Zombies' movement speed by the same amount as Chill, but doesn't stack. Scares Small Zombies.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Dogwood is part St. Firnard, part Pineranian, a bit of Oaker Spaniel, and all "Who's a Good Boy?"

pages.title: ‚è≥ Staller
pages.text: $(#25228d)Dogwoods slow Zombies in front of them by barking at them. Frightens small Zombies to death.
